name: Shaggy & Scooby-Doo Get a Clue!
overview: Shaggy & Scooby-Doo Get a Clue! is the tenth incarnation of Hanna-Barbera's Scooby-Doo series of Friday night cartoons. It debuted on September 23, 2006, and ran on Kids WB on Saturday mornings. Produced by Warner Bros. Animation, this was the last cartoon series produced by co-creator, Joseph Barbera. The second season premiered on Teletoon in Canada on September 6, 2010, at 8:30 a.m., and is also available online at Cartoon Network Online.

episodes.name: Shags To Riches
episodes.overview: Shaggy's uncle disappears and leaves Shaggy with millions of dollars, so Shaggy and Scooby-Doo go to the mansion he left for them and start exploring. They see some of his inventions and then Shaggy sees a note about how his new invention is trying to be stolen by someone and now he must go into hiding. Now Scooby and Shaggy have to go and solve another mystery.

episodes.name: More Fondue for Scooby-Doo!
episodes.overview: After receiving an urgent holographic transmission from Uncle Albert, Shaggy and Scooby travel to Switzerland, using their new and improved mystery machine, in order to thwart Dr. Phibes' efforts in interrupting an anti-global warming conference. Once Phibes realizes he's being followed, he counteracts by sending one of his most dangerous agents after them.

episodes.name: High Society Scooby
episodes.overview: Dr. Phibes' latest evil plot is to abduct three of the world's leading scientists in order to gain technologically advanced weapons. Shaggy and Scooby must prevent this by sneaking into the country club where the scientists are being honored and protect them at all costs. However, they also have to deal with Phibes' agents.

episodes.name: Party Arty
episodes.overview: Shaggy and Scooby decide to throw a housewarming party, but their neighbor and president of the Housing Association, Thurston Havansimp, sets out on derailing their plans. He threatens to cite them with enough code and permit violations to evict them from their house and the neighborhood. Meanwhile, Dr. Phibes finds about the party and sends a deadly robot to the Shaggleford Mansion with orders to annihilate the dynamic duo.

episodes.name: Smart House
episodes.overview: Dr. Phibes plans on unleashing an evil computer virus into the nation's weapon defense systems, but Uncle Albert gets word of it first. While intercepting the virus, Shaggy and Scooby unknowingly release the virus into their in-house's computer system, which soon takes control of every appliance and utility in the mansion.

episodes.name: Lightning Strikes Twice
episodes.overview: After a bad experience from the past with lightning, Dr. Phibes creates a machine from his space station that causes thunderstorms across the world. Scooby must face his fear of lightning as he and Shaggy work on a way to stop Phibes.

episodes.name: Don't Feed the Animals
episodes.overview: Dr. Phibes sets out to destroy the rainforest in search for the secret to eternal youth. Meanwhile, poachers try to stop Shaggy and Scooby.

episodes.name: Mystery of the Missing Mystery Solvers
episodes.overview: Shaggy and Scooby are nominated for the "Mystery Solvers of the Millennium" award. However, at the ceremony, the mystery solvers begin disappearing one by one while Shaggy and Scooby must work fast to discover who's taking them before they're next.

episodes.name: Chefs of Steel
episodes.overview: Dr. Phibes decides to hit Shaggy and Scooby in their most vulnerable spot - their stomachs! He invents a hypnotic hibachi and then hires an evil chef to use it on them as they visit the set of their favorite cooking show, "Chefs of Steel".

episodes.name: Almost Ghosts
episodes.overview: Shaggy and Scooby meet up with Fred, Velma, and Daphne at a military base where Dr. Phibes' agents use their new invisible technology to steal weapons.

episodes.name: Pole to Pole
episodes.overview: In order to gain immortality, Dr. Phibes plans on setting off a bomb at the end of the "Polar Bear 3000" race which will destroy all electronics across the world. Naturally, Shaggy and Scooby enter the race to make sure that he doesn't succeed.

episodes.name: Big Trouble
episodes.overview: Dr. Phibes is finally going to get his wish and become immortal! He has built a giant robot version of himself and plans to conquer the world with it. It is up to Shaggy and Robo-Scooby to put a stop to his big plans.

episodes.name: Operation Dog and Hippy Boy
episodes.overview: With the intention of finally stealing Uncle Albert's secret formula, Dr. Phibes assembles three of the most ruthless criminals in history to destroy Shaggy and Scooby.

episodes.name: Shaggy and Scooby World
episodes.overview: On the opening day of Shaggy and Scooby's own amusement park, Dr. Phibes works to control every attraction and turn the park into total chaos. Shaggy and Scooby must prevent this while attempting to create a diversion for everyone in attendance.

episodes.name: Almost Purr-fect
episodes.overview: Phibes infiltrates Shaggy and Scooby's mansion in his new cat guise while our heroes hold a dog show. Robi even enters his home-made mechanical dog, Sparky, into the show.

episodes.name: Inside Job
episodes.overview: After learning Dr. Phibes consumed a large quantity of the new nano-tech formula, Shaggy and Scooby must quickly devise a plan to rid of every nano-bot inside his body before Phibes becomes completely unstoppable.

episodes.name: Zoinksman
episodes.overview: Now fully nano-powered, Dr. Phibes plans to blow up his new remote volcanic lair which would cause nuclear winter and mass extinction around the world. Meanwhile, Shaggy arms himself with Uncle Albert's super suit as he and Scooby must infiltrate the lair to once again put a stop to Phibes' evil plans.

episodes.name: The Many Faces of Evil
episodes.overview: Dr. Phibes' latest world domination plan includes producing a massive army of nano clones. Each clone represents a different part of Phibes' personality. Shaggy and Scooby must face their toughest task yet, but little do they know that if Scooby consumes too much of the nano formula, the more likely he will become immune to its effects. Meanwhile, Robi's spring cleaning creates even more chaos for everyone.

episodes.name: Cruisin' for a Bruisin'
episodes.overview: On the verge of a mental breakdown, Dr. Phibes decides to take a vacation while Shaggy and Scooby win tickets for a Mexican cruise -- the exact same cruise that Phibes is on.

episodes.name: There Is a Doctor in the House
episodes.overview: After being evicted from the lair by his evil clone, Dr. Phibes moves in with Shaggy and Scooby. However, due to Phibes' incessant crank calls, the clone decides to do something that even the real Phibes would never consider -- activate their Doomsday machine.

episodes.name: Super Scary Movie Night
episodes.overview: Dr. Phibes and his agents and techies make a DVD of a horror movie with real monsters, and thanks to Robi's new 4-D entertainment system, the monsters invade Shaggy and Scooby's home. A pig named Bacon from a trailer Agent 2 was obsessing about also lounges around, and Scooby and Shaggy work on a way to stop the monsters and Phibes before he can make copies of the DVD.

episodes.name: Runaway Robi
episodes.overview: After hearing Shaggy and Scooby comment on how he isn't good at butlering or much else, Robi thinks he's failed at his job and leaves. He leaves Sparky to take his place transmitting Uncle Albert's messages. Soon Agents 1 and 2 find him at his new job in a criminal hangout. Now, unless Shaggy and Scooby stop him, Dr. Phibes will be able to gain access to Uncle Albert's inventions, as well as discover where he's hiding. And to make matters worse, Robi won't survive the downloading process.

episodes.name: Don't Get a Big Head
episodes.overview: Dr. Phibes, tired of being outsmarted by our heroes, revises his nano formula to increase his IQ. It also inflates his head. Now, Shaggy and Scooby must stop him from releasing a gas that will drastically lower the world's intelligence.

episodes.name: Scooby Dudes
episodes.overview: Dr. Phibes plans to avenge his unhappy childhood by unleashing a stampede of genetically engineered chicken bulls on the Western Tri-State Fair. Shaggy and Scooby must now find a way to stop him, while facing purring vultures, a hissing goat, and an 11-foot cross-eyed rooster.
